name: agentc-ai-developer
description: Brief Minimo methodology with integrated microprocessos: /brief (Microprocesso 1.1) → /setup-local-observability (Microprocesso 1.2) → /spike-agentic (Microprocesso 1.3) → /backlog (incremental development with prioritization scores and issue tracking) with skills. Six commands with /analyze-slices for S1.1 gate validation, /backlog with create/update/view/refine/issues modes. help-assistant agent. spike-agentic and microprocesso-1-2 skills for progressive disclosure. Agentic loop validation, architecture exploration, LangGraph patterns. Full support for greenfield and existing projects.
